resources.string:
1. You must not quit the app at any point of time during the data collection.
 2. You must keep the phone on at all the time while data collection.
 3. You must use the app when phone is in better battery status and when not performing so many background apps.
 4. You must roam all the positions to take atleast 450 distint cordinates in 500 cordinates.
 5. Please make sure you have given all the permissions to the app.
 6. In case app crash please contact developer(+919030304098).
